name: get_current_time
description: Get the current time.

response.name: current_time
response.description: Current time in HH:MM AM/PM format.

name: update_market_status
description: Update the market status based on the current time.

current_time_str.description: Current time in HH:MM AM/PM format.

response.name: status
response.description: Status of the market ('Open' or 'Closed').

name: get_symbol_by_name
description: Get the symbol of a stock by company name.

response.name: symbol
response.description: Symbol of the stock or "Stock not found" if not available.

name: get_stock_info
description: Get the details of a stock.

symbol.description: Symbol that uniquely identifies the stock.

response.name: MA20
response.description: 20-day Moving Average of the stock.

name: get_order_details
description: Get the details of an order.

response.name: status
response.description: Current status of the order.

name: cancel_order
description: Cancel an order.

order_id.description: ID of the order to cancel.

response.name: status
response.description: New status of the order after cancellation attempt.

name: place_order
description: Place an order.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to trade.

price.description: Price at which to place the order.

response.name: amount
response.description: Number of shares in the order.

name: make_transaction
description: Make a deposit or withdrawal based on specified amount.

response.name: new_balance
response.description: Updated account balance after the transaction.

name: get_account_info
description: Get account information.

response.name: binding_card
response.description: Card number associated with the account.

name: trading_login
description: Handle user login.

response.name: status
response.description: Login status message.

name: trading_logout
description: Handle user logout for trading system.

response.name: status
response.description: Logout status message.

name: fund_account
description: Fund the account with the specified amount.

amount.description: Amount to fund the account with.

response.name: new_balance
response.description: Updated account balance after funding.

name: remove_stock_from_watchlist
description: Remove a stock from the watchlist.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to remove.

response.name: status
response.description: Status of the removal operation.

name: get_watchlist
description: Get the watchlist.

response.name: watchlist
response.description: List of stock symbols in the watchlist.

name: get_transaction_history
description: Get the transaction history within a specified date range.

response.name: history
response.description: List of transactions within the specified date range.

name: update_stock_price
description: Update the price of a stock.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to update.

response.name: new_price
response.description: Updated price of the stock.

name: get_available_stocks
description: Get a list of stock symbols in the given sector.

sector.description: The sector to retrieve stocks from (e.g., 'Technology').

response.name: stock_list
response.description: List of stock symbols in the specified sector.

name: filter_stocks_by_price
description: Filter stocks based on a price range.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to filter.

response.name: filtered_stocks
response.description: Filtered list of stock symbols within the price range.

name: add_to_watchlist
description: Add a list of stocks to the watchlist.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to add to the watchlist.

response.name: symbols
response.description: List of stock symbols that were successfully added to the watchlist.

name: notify_price_change
description: Notify if there is a significant price change in the stocks.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to check.

threshold.description: Percentage change threshold to trigger a notification.

response.name: notifications
response.description: Notification message about the price changes.
